sentence.Network_en: All the churchmen have preached against immorality.

sentence.Network_en: Where the European sees immorality and lawlessness, strict law rules in reality.
sentence.Network_cn: 在欧洲人视为不道德和无规则的地方, 事实上都盛行着一种严格的规则.

sentence.Network_en: The result is immorality and delinquency; in short, personal and social disorganization.
sentence.Network_cn: 其后果便是道德堕落与犯罪现象, 简言之, 就是个人的与社会的解组.

entry.def: If you describe someone or their behaviour as immoral, you believe that their behaviour is morally wrong.

example.ex: ...those who think that birth control and abortion are immoral.
example.tran: 那些认为节育与堕胎是不道德行为的人

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of not being in accord with standards of right or good conduct;

sentences.sentence: "the immorality of basing the defense of the West on the threat of mutual assured destruction"
